data.text: @Phil198811 @org_scp @STSFTrust @sajidjavid Could.. I don’t trust anything this Gov say anymore. Ireland have scrapped all restrictions for everyone and they are part of the UK Common Travel Area so why are the UK dragging their feet?

@org_scp @STSFTrust @sajidjavid The disgraceful discrimination of unvaccinated British Citizens continues in the UK. Yet MP’s in this country making a show of helping unvaccinated from Eastern Europe. The hypocrisy needs to end. Millions of Brits need to stop being treated like 2nd Class citizens. 😡
@org_scp @STSFTrust @sajidjavid People need to #wakeup fast as our freedom is being eroded whilst we are watching the war on TV!!!
@org_scp @STSFTrust @sajidjavid I really don’t understand why no lawyer is setting up a special service to help us sue the lot of them every time they come up with this nonsense.

@org_scp @STSFTrust @sajidjavid This policy discriminates against minorities, particularly black communities who are less likely to want vaccination and against conservatives who are against government intervention in principle.
